sentences.sContent: As we saw in the preceding chapter, groups can be powerful agents of socialization.
sentences.sCn: 如我们在前一章所见，团组可以是社会化的有力动因。

sentences.sContent: ...and those people continue to reap rich rewards into old age because these days the educated elderly are more productive than the preceding generation...

remMethod.val: pre(…前) ＋ ced(行走) ＋ ing → 走在前面的 → 在前的

trans.tranOther: happening or coming before the time, place, or part mentioned
